LanguageData.RT_M1075_HEMTT_Blueprint.label: M1075 PLS
LanguageData.RT_M1075_HEMTT_Blueprint.description:
An 10-wheel drive, diesel-powered tactical truck with 9 tons of cargo capacities, equipped a 7.62mm self-defence machine gun.

<color=#bb8f04>Crew:</color> Driver x1, Gunner x1
<color=#bb8f04>Fuel:</color> Chemfuel

<color=#b0e0e6>CE Ammo:</color> 
.50 BMG（Support MG）
